subject: Race and Ethnicity
Blacks
Athletics and Sports
Basketball
Football
lead_paragraph: The Tim Tebow and Jeremy Lin phenomenons have prompted this question: When was the last time a young, untested professional African-American athlete was on the receiving end of this type of adulation?
snippet: The Tim Tebow and Jeremy Lin phenomenons have prompted this question: When was the last time a young, untested professional African-American athlete was on the receiving end of this type of adulation?
